item.description:
Sienna is located in the heart of Federal Hill and has received a lot of awards, including the 2010 Rhode Island's Best Italian Restaurant award! Sienna has a great deal going for Providence Restaurant Week and is offering a tasty 3-course prix fix menu for $30.
YUM!
Prix Fix Dinner Menu. -> http://www.goproviden...

Sienna's restaurant week menu is pretty broad for restaurant week and should have something for everyone. A great opportunity to get out enjoy this tasty week!

Everyone will be responsible for the cost of their own dinner and the $30 does not inc tax/tip/ and bev. If you can bring cash of course that will make the bill so much easier :)

Because I'll have to make a reservation RSVPs need to be in a day before. Hope to see you there for some tasty Italian!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the bar @ 8:00pm. Take a good look at my photo so you can find me!
item.name: Providence Restaurant Week Dinner at Sienna!
